description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues related to Windows Server crashing due to the recent out-of-band release:

1. Apply the emergency update identified in KB-5037425 to mitigate the crashes.
2. Ensure that all systems are backed up before proceeding with the update installation to avoid any data loss during the process.

**Details**:
This emergency update aims to remedy system instabilities that may arise after certain updates. It is essential to confirm that the update is completely applied across all relevant servers to stabilize operations. Critical attention should be paid to verifying the successful deployment of this fix.
